quote: To see the beauty, love
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Beauty is the illumination of your soul.
author: John O'Donohue,  Anam Cara: A Book of Celtic Wisdom

quote: Beauty is the purest feeling of the soul. Beauty arises when soul is satisfied.
author: Amit Ray,  Nonviolence: The Transforming Power

quote: Beauty is about being comfortable in your own skin. It's about knowing and accepting who you are.
author: Ellen DeGeneres,  Seriously... I'm Kidding

quote: Beauty is the virtue of the body as virtue is the beauty of the soul
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Beauty is no quality in things themselves: It exists merely in the mind which contemplates them; and each mind perceives a different beauty.
author: David Hume,  Of the Standard of Taste and Other Essays

quote: Beauty is not who you are on the outside, it is the wisdom and time you gave away to save another struggling soul, like you.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Love of beauty is taste. The creation of beauty is art.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Beauty is when you can appreciate yourself. When you love yourself, that's when you're most beautiful.
author: Zoe Kravitz

quote: Beauty is a heart with wings.
author: A.D. Posey

quote: Truth is beauty
author: Lisi Harrison

quote: True beauty is something that attacks, overpowers, robs, and finally destroys.
author: Yukio Mishima

quote: The power of finding beauty in the humblest things makes home happy and life lovely.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: True beauty radiates not from outer cosmetics, but from the simple joy of making a difference for those that need your voice, passion, and time without expecting or wanting anything in return...
author: Deborah Barnes

quote: Unexpected intrusions of beauty. This is what life is.
author: Saul Bellow,  Herzog

quote: Beauty is a whore, I like money better.
author: Michael Cunningham,  The Hours

quote: True beauty lies in purity of the heart.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: There is no exquisite beauty… without some strangeness in the proportion.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: Your real beauty is hidden in your heart.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The kind of beauty I want most is the hard-to-get kind that comes from within - strength, courage, dignity.
author: Ruby Dee

quote: Beauty as we feel it is something indescribable; what it is or what it means can never be said.
author: George Santayana

quote: I always say you can never be extravagant with beauty. Beauty is God made real. Beauty is life.
author: Imelda Marcos

quote: They say beauty is in the eye of the beholder. I think the same could be said for time.
author: Jake Vander Ark,  The Day I Wore Purple

quote: A thing of beauty is a joy for ever: Its loveliness increases; it will never Pass into nothingness; but still will keep A bower quiet for us, and a sleep Full of sweet dreams, and health, and quiet breathing.
author: John Keats

quote: A thing of beauty is a joy forever.
author: John Keats,  Endymion: A Poetic Romance

quote: Life is a land of opportunity to love, live, and enjoy beauty.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: No sooner have you feasted on beauty with your eyes than your mind tells you that beauty is vain and beauty passes
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: But beauty is about finding the right fit, the most natural fit, To be perfect, you have to feel perfect about yourself --- avoid trying to be something you're not. For a goddess, that's especially hard. We can change so easily.-Aphrodite
author: Rick Riordan,  The Lost Hero

quote: Beauty is only skin deep, but ugly goes clean to the bone.
author: Dorothy Parker

quote: Beauty is truth, truth beauty,—that is all Ye know on earth, and all ye need to know
author: John Keats,  The Complete Poems

quote: Everything has beauty, but not everyone sees it.
author: Confucius

quote: The human soul is hungry for beauty; we seek it everywhere - in landscape, music, art, clothes, furniture, gardening, companionship, love, religion, and in ourselves. No one would desire not to be beautiful. When we experience the beautiful, there is a sense of homecoming.
author: John O'Donohue

quote: There is nothing more rare, nor more beautiful, than a woman being unapologetically herself; comfortable in her perfect imperfection. To me, that is the true essence of beauty.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: Don't get me wrong, I admire elegance and have an appreciation of the finer things in life. But to me, beauty lies in simplicity.
author: Mark Hyman

quote: Exuberance is beauty.
author: William Blake

quote: God's pleasure--the beauty creation possesses in his regard--underlies the distinct being of creation, and so beauty is the first and truest word concerning all that appears within being; beauty is the showing of what is; God looked upon what he had wrought and saw that it was good.
author: David Bentley Hart,  The Beauty of the Infinite: The Aesthetics of Christian Truth

quote: Outer beauty pleases the EYE. Inner beauty captivates the HEART.
author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass

quote: The truth isn't always beauty, but the hunger for it is.
author: Nadine Gordimer

quote: The level of consciousness defines the beauty of our lives.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You are beautiful. Your beauty, just like your capacity for life, happiness, and success, is immeasurable.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Since love grows within you, so beauty grows. For love is the beauty of the soul.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Uniqueness is what makes you the most beautiful.
author: Lea Michele

quote: It is amazing how complete is the delusion that beauty is goodness.
author: Leo Tolstoy,  The Kreutzer Sonata

quote: What you do, the way you think, makes you beautiful.
author: Scott Westerfeld,  Uglies

quote: I'm pretty much looking for beauty all the time. It just seems like some days the light is better to see it.
author: Melodie Ramone

quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: There is nothing more beautiful than someone who goes out of their way to make life beautiful for others.
author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass

quote: Beauty is terror. Whatever we call beautiful, we quiver before it.
author: Donna Tartt,  The Secret History

quote: There's more beauty in truth, even if it is dreadful beauty.
author: John Steinbeck,  East of Eden
